parameters.name: AllSubClustersSuccess
parameters.description:
To edit a GlobalView aggregated instance, do you require all passed child instances to be verified successfully before creating a GlobalView instance (optional, default to false):
- true
- false

parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the Prometheus instance.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the global aggregation instance.

parameters.name: MostRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the global aggregation instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the Prometheus instance resides.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the Prometheus instance belongs.

parameters.name: SubClustersJson
parameters.description: The data sources of the Prometheus instance for GlobalView.
